Key Match Events: Jalen Green scored 22 of his 29 points in the third quarter
Houston overcame a 20-point first quarter — the fewest points allowed by last-place Washington in a period this season
Post-Match Reflections: Corey Kispert scored 23 points and Jonas Valanciunas added 18 in the Wizards’ third straight defeat
Miscellaneous Highlights: Houston improved to 6-1 on the road against Eastern Conference opponents
Charlotte snapped a 10-game losing streak with a win over Phoenix
The Hornets dominated Phoenix on the glass, outrebound the Suns 59-42
Others: The Rockets routed the short-handed Washington Wizards 135-112
